code: @Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean @ConditionalOnBean(Client.class) public ElasticsearchTemplate elasticsearchTemplate(Client client, ElasticsearchConverter converter) {     try {         return new ElasticsearchTemplate(client, converter).     } catch (Exception ex) {         throw new IllegalStateException(ex).     } }
@Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean public SimpleElasticsearchMappingContext mappingContext() {     return new SimpleElasticsearchMappingContext(). }
